definition: to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with

pinyin: xing4 bie2 ren4 tong2 zhang4 ai4

sentences.english: Of course, we don’t accept the unrealistic overstatement about reverse merger.
sentences.chinese: 當然我們並不認同那些片面誇大反向收購作用的作法。

sentences.english: I can't go along with you on that, I'm afraid.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕在這一點上無不能認同你的說法。

sentences.english: With the development of detective methods, the concept of transdifferentiation is being accepted by people.
sentences.chinese: 隨着檢測手段的進步，轉分化正逐漸被人們認同。

sentences.english: We have listened to Danish and spoken it from childhood. It is the joy of recognition we experience.
sentences.chinese: 我們從小就聽說丹麥語，這是我們經歷認同感的快樂。

sentences.english: But in this area, it seems that no good idea goes unpunished.
sentences.chinese: 但是在這個地區，好提議卻往往得不到認同。

sentences.english: The culture is the real life of people toward self-identification by nature.
sentences.chinese: 文化是永遠朝向自我認同而存在的人的現實生活。

sentences.english: is very highly regarded internally at Apple.
sentences.chinese: 庫克在公司內部有很高的認同度。

sentences.english: England still hasn't caught up to the concept of the hyphenated identity.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭還不能跟上聯衆認同的觀念。

sentences.english: Therefore, the identity transition is an important variable for America to rise in peac…
sentences.chinese: 因此，認同轉換是美國實現和平崛起的重要變量。

sentences.english: And suppose the soul is the key to personal identity.
sentences.chinese: 假設靈魂就是個人認同感的關鍵。

sentences.english: You spin the story another way,and I follow the personality.
sentences.chinese: 你換一種方法來講，我又認同了人格理論。

sentences.english: I guess all of us would agree that we can never have enough massaging gadgets.
sentences.chinese: 我猜想我們都認同現在的按摩工具功能都不夠齊全。

sentences.english: The thesis is a conclusion of the study, which is about kindergarteners professional identification.
sentences.chinese: 本文是關於幼兒園教師職業認同研究的結果。

sentences.english: Where left and right agree is that America feels adrift right now.
sentences.chinese: 左派和右派都認同的一點是美國現在處於迷茫期。

sentences.english: The ordered development of the Singapore society is always approved by the countries all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡社會的有序發展向來被世界各國所認同。

sentences.english: He needs also to identify the opponent more clearly and stick with it.
sentences.chinese: 他同時也需要和自己的對手有認同感，並且始終如一。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to attach importance to sth/to value
to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
